com.github.dandelion.core.asset.locator

Interface AssetLocator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAssetLocator, ApiLocator, ClasspathLocator, FileLocator, JarLocator, RemoteLocator, WebappLocator, WebjarLocator

    public interface AssetLocator

    SPI for all asset locators.

    Since:
    0.2.0
    Author:
    Romain Lespinasse, Thibault Duchateau

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getContent(Asset asset, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Returns the content of the given Asset.
      String getLocation(AssetStorageUnit asu, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Computes and returns the location of the asset.
      String getLocationKey() 
      void initLocator(Context context)
      Initializes the configured service provider of the AssetLocator SPI by using the Context.
      boolean isCachingForced() 

    • Method Detail

      • initLocator

        void initLocator(Context context)

        Initializes the configured service provider of the AssetLocator SPI by using the Context.

        Parameters:
        context - The Context initialized in the DandelionFilter.

      • getLocationKey

        String getLocationKey()
        Returns:
        the location key associated to the locator.

      • getLocation

        String getLocation(AssetStorageUnit asu,
                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)

        Computes and returns the location of the asset.

        Parameters:
        AssetStorageUnit - The asset storage unit from which the location should be extracted.
        request - The current HTTP request.
        Returns:
        the customized location

      • getContent

        String getContent(Asset asset,
                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)

        Returns the content of the given Asset.

        Note that this method can be used to access the asset's content after the AssetProcessor's execution.

        Parameters:
        asset - The asset from which the content should be extracted.
        request - The current HTTP request.
        Returns:
        a String holding the content of the Asset.

      • isCachingForced

        boolean isCachingForced()
        Returns:
        true if the asset has to be cached in order to be accessed by the DandelionServlet, otherwise false if it can be directly accessed.
